name: Impact: 2018
description:
8-Bit style graphics mini game.

Great game to play with friend, challenge your friends to see how many asteroids they can destroy.

Gameplay:-
Earth is about to meet it's doom, a number of asteroids are heading strait for the planet and you must defend it at all cost.

Destroy the asteroids by taping on them and don't let one past else it's game over.

Watch out for power ups, as they will help you destroy more asteroids and defend the earth from doom.
